!Gabrielle: One of my ancestors participated in the Antharas conquest. People call them the Seventeen Nemeses of the Land Dragon. All I know is pieces of stories that I heard from my grandparents. There are many tales, and I don't know which is true. The poet may know, if you can get him to talk. [Quest _241_PossessorOfaPreciousSoul1 30753-02.htm|"Who is he?"]
